diagrams.description: Human Resource Management encompasses specialized functions that collectively optimize human capital. Talent acquisition sources and selects candidates through strategic recruiting and interviewing. Learning and development enhances skills via training programs, career development, and leadership coaching. Compensation management designs salary structures, incentives, and comprehensive benefits packages. Employee relations fosters positive workplace culture through conflict resolution and engagement initiatives. HR analytics leverages data to inform workforce decisions and predict trends. Compliance ensures adherence to labor laws and workplace safety regulations. Strategic HR aligns people practices with business objectives.
